text: @MarshaBlackburn Trump, the GOP, and Fox News spent two months wishing covid19 away.  Providing happy talk while putting their heads in the sand and doing nothing is criminal.  The buck stops in DC—not China.  Our intelligence services accurately briefed the problem so Senators sold.  #tnpol .
